root.name: Mystery Trackers: The Void
root.description: OverviewMystery Trackers: The Void is a hidden objects game developed by Elephant Games and published by Big Fish Games for the PC, Mac, and iPad platforms.Mystery Trackers: The Void has a version for the PC and Mac that contains more content that is labeled as the collectors edition, while the iPad version is titled Mystery Trackers: The Void HD.PlotMystery Trackers: The Void takes place in the mansion of Dr. Malleus Void. Legend has it that Dr. Malleus was conducting some horrible experiments in the home which ran down the home. The mansion was abandoned for a decade before reports started coming in that three big time celebrities have gone missing while exploring the mansion.The Mystery Tracker team has been hired to explore and solve the various mysteries going on in the home and find the missing celebrities.
